MapEditor.Model

类 ConquestMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • MapEditor.Model.ConquestMap
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Object>

    public class ConquestMap
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Object>
    The Map model. Handles with the data change, also takes care of load & save function. In Observer pattern, plays the role of subject.

    • 嵌套类概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addContinent(Continent cont)
      Add a qualified continent to the local variables.
      void addTerritory(Territory ter)
      Add a qualified territory to the local variables, then build the neighbour links.

      method building connections among territories, each territory has a parameters of its linked territories

      If the data has been changed, call this function to notify observers.

      Initial function of the class, normalize the local variables.

      The override function for Comparator, designed to compare the order of two territory.
      int countTerritories(Continent cont)
      Count the number of current territories in target continent.
      void deleteContinent(Continent cont)
      Delete the input continent, and remove the link between continent and its territories,set null continent to these territories.
      void deleteTerritory(Territory ter)
      Delete the target territory, also remove all links in its neighbours.

      method to check if a territory is board to others in the target continent.

      method to check if a territory is board to others in the territories list.

      void load(java.lang.String mapFilePath)
      loading the map in absolute path and if a map file does not match the format, throwing the exception and resetting. parsing map, reading information of Continents and Territories, finishing map reading and change current state.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadingCheck()
      check map parameters, if a territory has links. check if a map file has a matched image file. check if a map file and its matched image file are in the same path. check the territory link information. check if the territory list is not empty and it can not reach to other territories.
      void save()
      saving a map, if path is valid and save the file, else throws path does not exist information.

      comfirming to save the new map

      input the author of the edited map file, change the map information.

      input the Continent name, it can not be null, and change the map information

      save the image file in a path the user wants.

      save the map file path in a path the user wants
      void setScroll(ConquestMap.ScrollOptions scroll)
      confirming if it is scroll.
      void setWarn(boolean warn)
      confirming if it is warn.
      void setWrap(boolean wrap)
      confirming if it is warp.
      void updateContinent(java.lang.String oldName, java.lang.String newName, int newBonus)
      updating the continent information, containing original name and new name and bonus which are expected to change, And change state of the new continent.
      boolean validityCheck()
      check map parameters, if a territory has links. check if a map file has a matched image file. check if a map file and its matched image file are in the same path. check the territory link information. check if the territory list is not empty and it can not reach to other territories.

        public ConquestMap()

      • changeState

        public void changeState()
        If the data has been changed, call this function to notify observers.

        参数:

        参数:

      • countTerritories

        public int countTerritories(Continent cont)
        Count the number of current territories in target continent.
        参数:
        cont - The target continent.
        返回:
        The number of current territories.

      • deleteContinent

        public void deleteContinent(Continent cont)
        Delete the input continent, and remove the link between continent and its territories,set null continent to these territories.
        参数:
        cont - The target continent needed to remove.

      • deleteTerritory

        public void deleteTerritory(Territory ter)
        Delete the target territory, also remove all links in its neighbours.
        参数:
        ter - The target territory needed to be removed.

      • findContinent

        public Continent findContinent(java.lang.String name)
        Input a name of the continent, if valid, return the continent.
        参数:
        name - The input name.
        返回:
        If name is valid, return the continent. If not valid, return null.

      • findContinentIndex

        public int findContinentIndex(java.lang.String name)
        Return the index of continent in local variables.
        参数:
        name - The target name of continent wanted to find out.
        返回:
        If name is valid, return the index. If not, return -1.

      • isDisparateImageFileDirectory

        public boolean isDisparateImageFileDirectory()
        check whether a map contains two different format files including .map text file and .bmp image file.
        返回:
        Return true if two different files are matched exactly, other wise return false.

      • isWarn

        public final boolean isWrap()
        check whether is Warp or not
        返回:
        Return warp

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String mapFilePath)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        loading the map in absolute path and if a map file does not match the format, throwing the exception and resetting. parsing map, reading information of Continents and Territories, finishing map reading and change current state.
        参数:
        mapFilePath - path where map file locates.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception
        另请参阅:
        validityCheck(), clear(), changeState()

        参数:
        t -

        public void updateContinent(java.lang.String oldName,
                            java.lang.String newName,
                            int newBonus)
        updating the continent information, containing original name and new name and bonus which are expected to change, And change state of the new continent.
        参数:
        oldName -
        newName -
        newBonus -

      • save

        public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.Exception
        saving a map, if path is valid and save the file, else throws path does not exist information.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception
        另请参阅:
        validityCheck()

      • validityCheck

        public boolean validityCheck()
        check map parameters, if a territory has links. check if a map file has a matched image file. check if a map file and its matched image file are in the same path. check the territory link information. check if the territory list is not empty and it can not reach to other territories.
        返回:
        false if also the check failed
        另请参阅:
        eachTerReachable()

      • loadingCheck

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadingCheck()
        check map parameters, if a territory has links. check if a map file has a matched image file. check if a map file and its matched image file are in the same path. check the territory link information. check if the territory list is not empty and it can not reach to other territories.
        返回:
        false if also the check failed
        另请参阅:
        eachTerReachable()

      • eachTerReachable

        public boolean eachTerReachable()
        method to check if a territory is board to others in the territories list.
        返回:
        true if they are boarded, else return false.

      • eachTerInContReachable

        public boolean eachTerInContReachable(Continent continent)
        method to check if a territory is board to others in the target continent. Also see the function eachTerReachable().
        返回:
        true if they are boarded, else return false.
